ns2:EnumDataTypeDefinition.ns1:desc: Contains the form in which this measurement data is obtained.

ns2:member.name: cc
ns2:member.ns2:desc: The collection method is Cumulative Counter.

ns2:member.name: der
ns2:member.ns2:desc: The collection method is Discrete Event Registration (DER). When data related to a particular event are captured, every nth event is registered, where n can be 1 or greater.

ns2:member.name: gauge
ns2:member.ns2:desc: The collection method is Gauge - based on a dynamic variable. This method is used when data being measured can vary up or down during the period of measurement.

ns2:member.name: si
ns2:member.ns2:desc: The collection method is Status Inspection. This is a mechanism for high frequency sampling of internal counters at pre-defined rates
